== Configuration ==
Open _config.php_ and modify config.

Jabber server configuration:
{{{
$config['server'] = "YOUR JABBER SERVER HERE"; // Jabber server
$config['port'] = 5222; //PORT
$config['room_service'] = "conference"; // CHAT SERVICE
$config['room'] = "ROOM"."@".$config['room_service'].".".$config['server']; // ROOM TO AUTOJOIN 
}}}

User configuration:
{{{
$config['user'] = "USER"; // USER
$config['room_user'] = "USER IN ROOM"; 
$config['password'] = "PASSWORD";
$config['resource'] = "RESOURCE";
$config['status'] = "BOT STATUS";
}}}

And enjoy ;)
